entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #57770
  • Perf regression: caching #57769
  • Quarantine CanUseAntiforgeryAfterInitialRender #57766
  • Create property: public Action<StaticFileResponseContext> OnAfterResponse #57763
  • Error serving Blazor Framework files when using MapStaticAssets and UseBlazorFrameworkFiles together. #57756
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #57751

Closed

  • Perf improvement: caching, mvc, plainTextEmptyFilter #57740
  • Consider Reducing Ceremony for `EventCallback` Creation #57726
  • unable to gracefully handle Blazor component rendering errors, such as Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] #57737
  • Provision to handle Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Rendering.WebAssemblyRenderer[100] error #57724
  • Perf regression: updates #57748

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Server` package README #57774
    area-blazor
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly` package README #57773
    area-blazor
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate` package README #57772
    area-security
  • Provide `Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly` package README #57771
    area-networking
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google` package README #57768
    area-security
  • Quarantine CanUseAntiforgeryAfterInitialRender #57767
    area-blazor
  • [release/9.0] [Static Assets] Improve development experience #57764
    Servicing-consider, needs-area-label
  • Fix unmatched paren in comment #57752
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing` package README #57736
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect` package README #57731
    area-security, 10.0-preview1
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-rc.2.24459.3 #57754
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • Perf improvement: Fix Cumulative Layout Shift issue in blank Blazor templates #57213
    area-mvc, area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-networking
  • #14423 User can verify multiple times with the same two factor token #57728
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Update Router.cs #57559
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • feat: extending `ApiBehaviorOptions` with skip `SkipStatusCodePages` #57597
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • feat: DefaultOutputCachePolicyProvider added #57362
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, area-middleware
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Disable launching browser on Web API template #57682
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57531
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0-rc2
  • ALWAYS include the Vary Accept-Encoding header when response compression is enabled #55092
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix ProjectTemplate build steps with new JDK #56199
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun
